subtitles:
51051 54214 People once believed
that when someone dies,

54304 57968 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

58684 62018 But sometimes,
something so bad happens

62104 66598 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it, and the soul can't rest.
67484 70442 Then, sometimes, just sometimes,

70529 75069 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.
98015 99380 I got one here.
130172 132334 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
132424 134665 Wedding was tomorrow night.

134760 137878 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

142517 145555 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.
145646 147762 All right, guys. Let's do it.

147856 151224 Devil's fucking Night.
What's the count so far?
152736 154522 They're slacking off from last year.

154613 157401 Three hours to go.
Maybe they're just slow starters.
157491 158606 Coming through.
163455 164445 Yeah, I realize that,

164539 166780 but you can't come in here
and take her away like this.
166875 168331 There are procedures to stick by.

168418 170750 You guys should have cleared this
with me first.
171505 172495 Is this the victim?
172589 173829 No, it's Amelia Earhart.

173924 175540 We found her, Detective,
and you missed it.

175634 178797 I don't care what her name is.
I didn't give the order to move her.

179721 182133 Jesus, Albrecht. I can see why
they took away your gold shield.

182224 184511 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.
186353 188264 All right. Clear out of here.

190148 191684 - Shelly?
- Stand back, kid.

194361 197319 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.
199616 201573 Tell him to take care of Sarah.

201660 204994 Look, I will. You just lie back.
Come on. Come on.

215424 217540 - Are you Sarah?
- Yeah.

217634 221673 Yeah, look. Your sister,
she's gonna be okay.
221763 223754 She's not my sister.
223849 226056 Shelly just takes care of me.
226143 227679 She's my friend.
227769 229100 Her and Eric.
232107 233939 You lied to her about Eric.
234025 235607 Look, I had to.
236361 238318 And you're lying to me about Shelly.
239698 241814 She's gonna die, isn't she?
250876 252787 Now, come on. Come on. It's...
253628 255210 I promise. It's okay.
258675 260040 She's gonna be fine.

278862 283447 A building gets torched.
All that is left is ashes.

283533 285774 I used to think
that was true about everything.
285869 289783 Families, friends, feelings.

290499 294367 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real,

294461 298921 two people who are meant to be together...
nothing can keep them apart.

337254 339120 What are you,
like the night watchman?

361778 367069 You know, what this place needs
is a good, natural catastrophe.
367158 370526 Earthquake, tornado... you know?
370620 373032 No, no. Mickey, come on, man.

373123 375080 You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
375166 377453 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
377544 379455 Hey, come on. Let me do it.
380672 383255 There we go. All right.
383341 384706 How about some onions?
384801 386257 Come on. Come on, man.

386344 388005 Don't cheap out on me.
Lots of onions.
388096 389211 All right. Here you go.
391766 392927 Now we're talking.
394477 397640 Hey, it's a Sarah monster.

398523 400685 How do you steer that thing
on a wet street?
400775 402857 Pure talent. Hi.

402944 406357 See, now, Sarah, she's a genuine
hotdogger. You hungry?

406448 408735 - You buying?
- I'm buying.

408825 412318 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?
412412 414153 They make you fart big-time.

422130 424713 You know, Lake Erie actually
caught on fire once

424799 426961 from all the crap
floating around in it.
428678 430510 I wish I could have seen that.

492617 497236 - Fire it up!
- Yeah! Yeah!

536369 539202 All right.
We busted that machine.

563271 566639 Oh, shit, guys.
T-Bird. Cop car. Cop car.
574365 576481 Bad people out on the street tonight.

582540 583905 - Damn it.
- Oh, my God!
584000 584990 What was that?

585085 586996 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.
587087 588703 Mickey, call it in for me.
686102 687558 Department of Housing.
688229 691563 Code violations? Safety hazards?
691649 694266 Place looks fine to me.
694360 695441 Let's redecorate.

701034 706620 Abashed the Devil stood
and felt how awful goodness is.

706706 710040 Saw virtue in her shape,
how lovely...
710126 711662 It's pornography.
724599 726681 No, no, no, no. Me first.

775108 777224 - Hey, that's good.
- That's good.

781489 784197 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?
785910 787492 Look at that. Look at that.

788871 793160 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.
793251 794332 To Devil's Night.

796296 798958 Baby, you need to go over there
and talk to your pals.
800341 802127 You sick fuck.

802927 805885 Are you out of
your motherfucking mind, man?
811728 813014 And look at that!
815023 816809 Pussies drink last, man.
818526 820016 Fuck you, Tin Tin.
822363 824570 That shit ain't even loaded, man.
825450 826531 This one is.

827535 833622 Which of you Motor City motherfuckers
wants to bet me this one isn't?

836377 843249 - Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
846346 848087 Here's your shooters.

848181 850218 - Put your guns away, guys.
- How you doing?

885635 888923 - I love you.
- Say that again.
894811 896176 Restaurant.
902860 904271 Wow, you look great.

913121 915658 - Come here.
- No! No! No!
1013638 1015800 Couple more rings. That's 24K.
1018434 1020425 It's crap. It's probably fake.
1020520 1022852 Leather purse. Leather.

1026192 1028934 What is this, Tin Tin?
A bloodstain that's on here?

1031989 1034606 I'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.
1034700 1036907 Now, you can take it or leave it.
1038579 1039944 Right there for you.
1041958 1044416 Decisions, decisions. Yes, right.
1046546 1049709 Cheap-ass, chrome-dome,

1049799 1053133 child-molesting,
saprophyte motherfucker.
1053219 1054584 Close the gate when you go out!
1054679 1057922 I close this up for you real good, massa.
1061686 1064053 Yeah, sit on it and twirl, you dirty scum.
1068776 1071188 You're lucky I didn't stab your fat ass.

1177718 1180631 What the fuck you all painted up for,
crackhead, huh?
1185643 1187805 Halloween ain't till ma√±ana.
1230229 1232971 Fuck! You murderer!

1233733 1236475 I didn't murder nobody, man.
I don't even fucking know you, man.

1236569 1240483 - What the fuck you want, man?
- I want you to tell me a story.
1240573 1242780 A man and a woman in a loft a year ago.

1244118 1246485 - You're out of your motherfucking mind...
- Listen!

1246579 1251540 I'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them on Halloween.
1251625 1253741 Yeah, yeah. Right. Halloween, yeah.

1253836 1256043 Some dude, some bitch...
Whatever, man.
1256547 1258379 Her name was Shelly.
1259216 1262004 You cut her. You raped her.
1262094 1263676 Shelly, yeah. Yeah.
1263763 1267256 I shanked her pink ass, and she loved it!

1278652 1281019 Murder?
Let me tell you about murder.
1284200 1286942 You gonna learn all about it.
1291624 1294207 I'd like you to meet two buddies of mine.
1296128 1297539 We never miss.
1306889 1309005 Try harder. Try again.
1330538 1335874 Sometimes it rains inside my head
1335960 1339954 All the words run dry

1340047 1344211 Walls are breathing,
hands are reaching up

1344301 1347339 Look at this mess.
What's the world coming to?
1347429 1348590 Yeah, it's a mess.
1348681 1351844 To touch my thigh
1353811 1356473 No, they don't have to take you away

1356564 1358726 I got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.
1358816 1363401 No, they don't have to take you away
1363487 1365979 Get out of my way, you worms!
1366073 1368360 No, they don't have to take you away
1368450 1369861 Give me some of that over there.

1372246 1374738 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.
1375624 1377456 Hey, guess what?

1377543 1381628 - Arcade Games fell down, went boom.
- Boom.
1381714 1384547 Can you imagine that? It's tragic.

1385426 1389385 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1389471 1392133 - Is the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.
1422504 1424415 You're thinking about the past.
1429470 1430835 Dad gave me this.
1431639 1433380 Fifth birthday.

1435809 1439723 He said, childhood's over the moment
you know you're gonna die.
1453953 1455614 Is she asleep?
1463128 1464618 I think we broke her.
1470344 1471505 I love her eyes.
1478352 1484473 No, they don't have to take you away
1490322 1492563 Hey, kid, get the hell out of the road!
1516098 1518260 I told you to stay out of here.

1518350 1522139 So I guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1524064 1526226 Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?
1526316 1527647 I don't have any dolls.
1530738 1532069 Get some food.
1532156 1534067 Somebody already bought me dinner.

1540748 1543706 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.
1559558 1561970 Who the fuck is this now?
1562061 1566225 Hey! Piss off! We're closed!

1569026 1572860 Go sleep it off somewhere else, dust head,
unless you want to get mutilated.
1577493 1579609 I'm gonna blow this guy's dick off.

1580829 1583696 Goddamn creatures of the night.
They never learn.
1593092 1595709 Suddenly I heard a tapping,

1595803 1599762 as if someone gently rapping...
rapping at my chamber door.
1602518 1604100 What the fuck are you talking about?
1604978 1606810 You heard me rapping, right?
1607898 1608888 You're trespassing,
1609983 1612020 and you owe me a fucking new door!

1614446 1617438 I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1618617 1621200 You're looking for a coroner,
shit-for-brains.
1630754 1633291 Shit on me. Shit on me!
1640389 1642676 Mr. Gideon, you're not paying attention.

1650607 1654726 I repeat,
a gold engagement ring, yes?

1655612 1659571 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1663370 1665862 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.
1671003 1672960 So who's this sack of shit?

1673046 1676289 That's Tin Tin,
one of T-Bird's little helpers.
1676383 1678795 I think you can rule out accidental death.

1679511 1682299 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?
1682389 1684130 This could be a turf hit,

1684224 1686306 but it doesn't look like
your usual gang crap.
1686393 1688179 Come on, Albrecht. Spare me.
1688270 1691353 You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.
1691440 1693351 I'm supposed to thank you for that, right?

1693984 1697193 Word to the wise,
watch your fucking mouth.
1698405 1700191 What the hell do you call that?
1702868 1704450 I call it blood, Detective.
1704536 1707779 I suppose you'll write it up as graffiti.
1707873 1711116 You can leave my crime scene now, okay?

1719301 1720791 - Warmer?
- What are you doing?

1720886 1723503 - Don't you know this game?
- What game are you talking about?

1724223 1726464 All right, the rings!
I'll tell you about the rings!

1726558 1729596 They're in that metal box.
It's under the shelf there.

1731396 1733387 Take them.
Take the fucking rings!

1733482 1736725 You can chew them, and you can choke
on them, you son of a bitch!

1740155 1742738 - Look, it goes up to the attic.
- Okay.
1761343 1763630 It's beautiful. I don't believe it.

1787703 1790616 - You have one chance to live.
- Look, man, take anything you want.

1790706 1792071 - Thank you.
- Take anything!

1795085 1798919 Now you're gonna tell me where to find
the rest of Tin Tin's little party pals.

1799006 1800917 The Pit.
They all hang out at The Pit.

1801008 1803716 All of T-Bird's little potato heads
hang out there.

1803802 1806043 Funboy, he lives there...
upstairs, all right?
1811810 1813847 A whole jolly club...

1813937 1816804 - Stop! Jesus, stop.
- With jolly pirate nicknames.

1816898 1819515 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!
1820736 1824604 Each one of these is a life.
1824698 1827190 A life you helped destroy.

1827284 1829867 I'm begging you, all right.
Don't kill me.
1831455 1832820 I'm not gonna kill you.

1833707 1837871 Your job will be to tell the rest of them
that death is coming for them.
1846470 1848962 Tell them Eric Draven sends his regards.

1852559 1856143 You walk out of here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1856730 1858562 You're nothing but street grease,
you hear?
1858648 1860855 Street grease, you motherfucker!
1860942 1862649 Is that gasoline I smell?
1884883 1887500 On the house, kiddo. You know that.
1892641 1894803 I can't do anything.

1895519 1899979 Your mom, technically,
she's off right now.

1906822 1910816 Police! Don't move.
I said don't move.

1912744 1914781 I thought the police
always said, freeze.

1914871 1917533 Well, I am the police,
and I say don't move, Snow White.
1917624 1918785 You move, you're dead.
1920210 1924044 And I say I'm dead and I move.
1924714 1927422 Not one more step. I'm serious.
1927509 1931844 Then shoot, if you will, Officer Albrecht.

1931930 1935048 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?
1936935 1938471 You don't remember me?
1938562 1940018 What are you talking about?

1940105 1944190 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?
1944276 1946813 Shelly Webster's dead, my friend.
1946903 1948814 I want you to move over to the curb there.
1948905 1950521 Come on, real nice and easy.
1950615 1951605 Come on. Move it!
1954494 1956030 We're gonna wait here for backup.
1956955 1958866 It's getting too frigging weird for me.
1959666 1961031 It gets better.
1961126 1963458 Do you know someone named T-Bird?

1963545 1966378 He had a friend
who shouldn't have played with knives.
1967174 1968209 Like the coat?
1968300 1969882 You're the guy that murdered Tin Tin.
1969968 1971424 Check it out.
1972762 1974048 He was already dead.

1975348 1978136 He died a year ago,
the moment he touched her.

1980479 1983642 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.
1984858 1986144 Get away from there!

1986234 1988817 - Cops!
- Come on. Get out of here!
1990572 1991983 Leave it. Leave it. Run!

2002334 2004701 Guy shows up
looking like a mime from hell,
2005212 2007078 and you lose him right out in the open.

2009216 2012425 at least he didn't do
that walking-against-the-wind shit.
2013595 2015085 Little early for Devil's Night.
2015972 2017508 What the hell is going on here?
2019100 2021307 You are very restless.

2021811 2024394 I just wish I was a little hungry again,
that's all.

2024940 2028649 - Be careful what you ask for.
- Yeah, you may get it. I know.
2040830 2043913 There are energies aligning against you.
2044000 2046037 Seeing is believing, isn't it?

2065522 2069481 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.
2069568 2072060 Nobody cleared this little event with me.
2072153 2074064 I didn't have nothing to do with that.
2074155 2076613 I'm sure you must be awful disappointed.

2076700 2080864 I got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

2080954 2083241 - Yeah? And who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

2083331 2085948 Somebody stuck his blades
in all his major organs
2086042 2087874 in alphabetical order.
2087961 2089497 Well, gentlemen, by all means,

2089588 2093422 I think we ought to have an introspective
moment of silence for poor old Tin Tin.

2096720 2099007 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2099097 2103967 - Whatever you say, I can do.
- Good. That's very reassuring.

2104060 2107598 I still ain't heard the story
on why Gideon's burned down.

2108815 2113355 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2114070 2115310 Call it my need to know.
2148938 2150224 Let me go, you creep!
2156696 2159063 You didn't slow down, dickhead!
2162202 2163692 He couldn't have stopped.

2163787 2165994 He was a butt face.
I could have made it.

2168166 2170703 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?
2175382 2177623 It's more like surfing than skating.
2177717 2179754 I wish the rain would stop, just once.
2180845 2182802 It can't rain all the time.
2201825 2203315 Don't thank me.
2205036 2206401 Are we fighting the good fight?

2206496 2210205 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.
2210917 2213659 Annie, look at that.

2215338 2219457 We, the undersigned tenants
of 1929 Caulderon Court apartments...
2219551 2220757 What is this, a petition?

2220844 2223711 A big kick-me sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause,
2223805 2225216 and a cause that got her killed.

2225306 2227889 She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

2227976 2233187 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend Eric Draven.

2233273 2235765 You know, the last time
you went snooping around on a case
2235859 2237475 is when you got put back on the beat.

2237569 2241563 - Yeah, I know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- I bet he does.

2249539 2252281 You're gonna wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2253543 2256001 - I'm cool.
- You didn't get that file from me, okay?
2256087 2258670 And don't tell me you owe me one.

2261009 2263376 - I owe you one.
- Yeah, right.

2291664 2295373 Tomorrow night,
we can... we can get high

2295460 2299294 and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.
2324572 2326779 There's a big fucking bird over there.
2334082 2335368 Come here, bird.
2336042 2337749 Hey, bird. Hey, bird.
2340255 2342838 Here, birdie, birdie, birdie.
2342924 2345882 Come here, birdie, birdie, birdie.
2348513 2350800 Birdie? Hey, birdie?
2356104 2358687 What the fuck?
2364612 2366102 No, man! Don't do that!
2366739 2369071 You nearly gave me a fucking heart attack!
2371953 2373193 Don't sweat it.

2375874 2379083 It's time for you to take your bird
and leave, freako.
2388428 2390044 Take your shot, Funboy.
2390138 2391845 You got me dead bang.
2394309 2397176 You are seriously fucked-up.
2397770 2399226 Did you look in the mirror?
2399314 2402397 I mean, you need professional help.
2407071 2409904 He shoots! He scores!

2420043 2424708 - Jesus Christ.
- Jesus Christ.
2424797 2426538 Stop me if you heard this one.
2426633 2428840 Jesus Christ walks into a hotel.

2434474 2437717 He hands the innkeeper three nails
and he asks...
2438895 2441353 Don't you ever fucking die?
2441439 2443225 Can you put me up for the night?

2449197 2451279 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck.
2451366 2453357 Yes, it fucking hurt.
2456704 2459992 Look what you've done to my sheets.
2484315 2486272 I've got a gun in my pocket.
2489153 2490939 You're happy to see me, aren't you?
2509757 2513671 Stay away! Stay away from me!

2525356 2529896 Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.
2529986 2531317 Do you understand?
2532822 2534733 Morphine is bad for you.

2546335 2549623 Your daughter is out there on the streets
waiting for you.

2581954 2584161 If I wanted ice,
I would have asked for ice!
2584248 2585329 Now fill it up!
2587627 2590210 Fill it up yourself, macho man.
2590296 2591536 I really need this.
2603392 2605474 You burn yourself playing with matches?

2605561 2607643 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2607730 2610688 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2610775 2613688 This is a first.
Do I bow or do I curtsy?
2614487 2616569 Now, get my friend here a glass of blood.
2618991 2621608 Hey, good night, Darla.
2626040 2629158 You stay put. Right there.
2638511 2640297 Get away, steam head.

2672962 2676796 As you can see, I'm here on the corner
of 27th street and East Washington Place,

2676883 2680126 the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.
2680219 2681550 It was exactly one year ago

2681637 2683878 that the building you see
across the street from me
2683973 2686010 was totally demolished by fire...

2686100 2688933 A fire that was fought
by seven fire companies.
2689020 2690931 We lost the lives of two firefighters.

2691022 2694060 In fact, if it weren't for
the constant surveillance
2694150 2695686 by the local police precinct...
2698613 2700854 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.
2707205 2708536 Good likeness.

2708623 2712287 I saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2713419 2714625 You still have your hat on.
2718007 2719372 I gotta sit down.
2730436 2734771 are you some kind of ghost?
2744408 2746319 I don't know what I am.

2746410 2748947 I need you to tell me
what happened to us.

2750831 2754290 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2755044 2758207 She was beaten and raped.
2758297 2759662 Died at the hospital.
2761259 2762875 Hey, you asked, man.
2762969 2764676 I mean, come on. Read the file.

2765429 2770014 Shelly Webster held on for 30 hours
in intensive care,
2770101 2772468 and her body finally just gave it up.

2773187 2775975 I saw it, man.
I couldn't do jack for her.

2787410 2789026 - Hey.
- Don't touch me!

2796335 2798747 - You okay?
- I saw her.
2801590 2803672 I saw her through your eyes.
2804969 2806710 You stayed with her the whole time.

2806804 2811594 Yeah, well, you got to understand
something, all right?

2812727 2817016 I was... I was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.
2817106 2818688 Give me something I could work with.
2825448 2827940 Why didn't you do something about it?

2828034 2829866 You think any of those people
in that building,

2829952 2833161 even the ones who signed the petition,
would talk after what happened to you?
2834957 2836868 I kept asking questions

2838044 2840911 and finally got busted for
sticking my nose where it wasn't wanted.
2844967 2846207 This your wife?
2846969 2849961 Yeah, we... Well, not anymore.
2850056 2851467 We're getting a divorce.

2856228 2859641 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.
2860149 2862390 I used to think they were kind of trivial.
2862485 2865648 Believe me. Nothing is trivial.

2876499 2880037 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.
2886050 2888963 Are you gonna vanish into thin air again?
2893015 2894756 I thought I'd use your front door.

2901440 2904182 I'm sorry as hell for what happened
to you and your girlfriend.

2916205 2919163 I got stabbed.
I shot the son of a bitch.
2919250 2921491 I watched the bullet hole close by itself.

2921585 2924418 And then I heard that my business
gets blown up real good.

2925089 2928207 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.
2928300 2931042 I saw him too. He had a guitar.

2931137 2935552 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.
2935641 2937097 He winked at you?
2940646 2942011 What else did you see?

2942106 2945144 So far I haven't heard shit about what
you're going to do about all this crap.
2945234 2946724 I mean, what do I get?

2946819 2950153 My livelihood...
it got flushed away and went swirling.
2952450 2954191 You ain't lost everything.

2954285 2957528 Yeah, and maybe
you're not such a big shot either!
2960291 2961497 Fair enough.

2966672 2969084 Say hello to the last fella
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

2969175 2971041 What, are you telling me
this thing is real?

2971135 2974628 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2974722 2977714 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2978976 2982435 You know, you're directly
out of your fucking mind! You know that?

2988152 2991110 It's one of the most important things
I learned from my sister.

2991197 2992813 Sister?
She's supposed to be your sister?
2994033 2996946 My father's daughter. That's right.

2997786 2999652 What's the matter?
You don't see the resemblance?

3001499 3005584 Now, let's take it from the top, friend.
In a lot of detail.
3005669 3006955 What do you say?

3007046 3010459 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

3010549 3014087 He told me to tell T-Bird
that death was on its way.

3014178 3016385 Whatever the fuck that means.
And...

3017139 3020222 Draven.
He said his name was Eric Draven.
3021268 3022758 Want to relax that thing now?

3023479 3026813 And this bird man...
